content.body:
> <@littledan:matrix.org> Bloomberg is hosting the Ecma General Assembly in New York, December 11-12, in our offices. All Ecma members (regardless of membership class) are invited. Please RSVP here: https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/bWm1KOve/vote

I think the time zone is off on that by a bit. also i thought it was two days?
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @littledan:matrix.org
Bloomberg is hosting the Ecma General Assembly in New York, December 11-12, in our offices. All Ecma members (regardless of membership class) are invited. Please RSVP here: https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/bWm1KOve/vote
I think the time zone is off on that by a bit. also i thought it was two days?
